Articles.Content:
Have you ever sent a probe to jool then another transfer window opens up right after? you send a couple missions to eve and moho but uh oh! you jool probe arrives at the same time you eve lander arrives, what now?! well instead of setting target why couldn't  you highlight the vessel to keep track from every ship you send out

Like the ships orbital path would be white instead of neon lime and you could go into the tracking station, right clikc the vessel you want to highlight and click highlight and every other ship you send out will see that vessel highlighted to keep track of where it is

This is smart but I am pretty sure that kerbal alarm clock does like time till maneuver, amount of supplies, time till encounter, etc... 

Edited November 25, 2020 by SomeOneWhoPlaysKSP
